name: dev-env-test
description: A test development environment with a WordPress plugin and a Node API

scripts.start: cd wp-plugin-test && npm run wp-env start && cd ../node-api-test && npm start
scripts.postinstall: cd node-api-test && npm install && cd ../wp-plugin-test && npm install
scripts.stop: cd wp-plugin-test && npm run wp-env stop

author: Joonas Nuutinen
